title: Blanket Drive for Kurigram
description: Help us distribute blankets to the people in Kurigram where temperature drops drastically in winter.

title: Sweater Donation in Sylhet Hills
description: Support children and elderly in Sylhet with warm sweaters during the chilly nights.

title: Cozy Winter for Dhaka's Homeless
description: Join hands to bring warm clothes to the homeless people of Dhaka city.

title: Winter Care for Bandarban Tribe
description: Donate sweaters and blankets for the tribal communities living in Bandarban.

title: Jessore Blanket Mission
description: Blankets and jackets are needed for the elderly and children of Jessore.

title: Warm Hearts in Rajshahi
description: Help us ensure no one in Rajshahi goes cold this winter season.
